text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationInterpretation where concept is-a ObservationInterpretationExpectation

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationInterpretation
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    ObservationInterpretationExpectationObservationInterpretationExpectationInterpretation of the observed result taking into account additional information (contraindicators) about the patient's situation. Concepts in this category are mutually exclusive, i.e., at most one is allowed.

name: ObservationInterpretationExpectation
title: ObservationInterpretationExpectation
description: Observation interpretation codes for expected results based on additional information (contraindicators) about the patient's situation.
